name: Achcauhtli the Axolotl Alchemist
description:
Entry for the November of NPCs Mausritter Jam.

Achcauhtli is a strange amphibian from a faraway land travelling the world in search of rare potion ingredients. Will offer potion-selling and potion-mixing services to players, and will also pay hefty sums of money for strange ingredients that may be difficult to acquire.

(Being an alchemist, Achcauhtli is intended to be used alongside my alchemy supplement The Alchemist's Handbook, which contains rules for potion-mixing and potion usage)

Achcauhtli is released under a CC BY-SA 4.0 license, so feel free to reuse, redistribute and modify as you see fit in your own commercial or non-commercial projects, as long as you live proper credit and release any derivative content under the same license.
